Yehova, mtima wanga sunadzikuzendi maso anga sanakwezeke;ndipo sindinatsate zazikulu,kapena zodabwitsa zondiposa.
Indedi, ndinalinganiza ndi kutontholetsa moyo wanga;ngati mwana womletsa kuyamwa amake,moyo wanga ndili nao ngati mwana womletsa kuyamwa.
Israele, uyembekezere Yehova,kuyambira tsopano kufikira kosatha.
